scripts.fmt:clj:check: cljfmt check --parallel=true common/src/ common/test/ frontend/src/ frontend/test/ backend/src/ backend/test/ exporter/src/
scripts.fmt:clj: cljfmt fix --parallel=true common/src/ common/test/ frontend/src/ frontend/test/ backend/src/ backend/test/ exporter/src/
scripts.lint:clj: yarn run lint:clj:common && yarn run lint:clj:frontend && yarn run lint:clj:backend && yarn run lint:clj:exporter
